channel.title: [PI] Soul Split Healing Effect

item.title: [PI] Soul Split Healing Effect
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:444860”]Go to the catch method
and in between the two {}
add e.printStackTrace.
That will tell you if there’s an error when you try to heal using the prayer[/quote]

I added it in:

} catch (Exception e) { System.out.println("Soulsplit instance has produced an error"); }

No errors seem to show up… Help? Do you need to see other parts of my combatassistant.java?

item.title: [PI] Soul Split Healing Effect
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

WHAT in the world is wrong with this code?! It will NOT heal any health but the code works flawlessly when I compile… HELP PLEASE!!!)#

if(c.prayerActive[44]) { // that's the soulsplit prayer id on my serv. if(c.oldNpcIndex > 0) { if(NPCHandler.npcs[c.oldNpcIndex] != null) { try { if(c.prayerActive[44] && !c.prayerActive[23] && c.playerLevel[3] <= 99) { int heal = 3; if(c.playerLevel[3] + heal >= c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3])) { c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); } else { c.playerLevel[3] += heal; } c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); }

Read full topic
